Bronze Age Iran is the (missing) link between the Yamnaya and modern day Iran. (pink in diagram, especially squares).  

My old question: did they come via the Caucasus or via the [Oxus](Oxus.html) is hereby resolved: they came the eastern route.  

[Zazaki](Zazaki.html) is a Northwestern Iranian language with very strong connections to known forms:
